attributes.action: Change age limit & Law for moped users so police can chase violent moped gangs
attributes.additional_details: The law must be changed so police can chase violent moped gangs without fear of prosecution if the rider fails to stop or is in a persuit. The minimum age for riding a moped should be increased to 18 & must have a FULL licence to carry a pillion passenger. If they are involved in any criminal activity using a moped they should face immediate ban for one year and there moped confiscated and crushed as a penalty if caught and found guilty. The law needs to be changed immediately on young offenders
attributes.background: In recent months, attacks by moped thugs have become more daring,violent & in some cases fatal,because the yobs have come to believe they are untouchable.Increasing numbers of moped muggers are stalking the streets, snatching mobile phones & throwing acid at members of the public and 999 services
